name: Carbon
description: Create and share beautiful images of your source code

scopes.name: read
scopes.reason: Read the file you select to create an image for

scopes.name: write-exec
scopes.reason: Export the resulting image to your Repl

longDescription:
Create and share beautiful images of your source code using carbon.now.sh, built straight into your Repl.

All you have to do is open the context menu of a file in your Repl, click `Open with Carbon` and boom. Instantaneous code snapshots.

This extension is unofficial and not related with the carbon.now.sh team at all.
